description: High-quality image-to-video generation with advanced motion control and customizable resolution options

prompt.description: The text prompt to guide video generation from the input image
prompt.placeholder: Man walked into winter cave with polar bear

image_url.description: URL of the input image to animate into video

duration.description: The duration of the generated video in seconds

resolution.description: The resolution of the generated video

prompt_optimizer.description: Whether to use the model's prompt optimizer for better results

prompt_details.style_guide: Create clear, descriptive prompts that explain the desired motion and action for the input image
best_practices: Describe the specific action or movement you want to see
Mention timing and pacing of the motion
Be specific about character actions and interactions
Consider the relationship between the prompt and the input image

prompt_structure.action_description: What action or movement should occur
prompt_structure.subject_interaction: How subjects interact with the environment
prompt_structure.motion_timing: Pacing and flow of the movement
prompt_structure.visual_continuity: How the motion relates to the input image

example_prompts.title: Nature Scene Animation
example_prompts.prompt: Man walked into winter cave with polar bear

example_prompts.title: Urban Movement
example_prompts.prompt: A person walking through a busy city street with cars passing by and people moving in the background

example_requests.title: Basic Image-to-Video
example_requests.description: Simple 6-second video generation from an image

request.prompt: A cat walking through a garden
A professional chef cooking in a modern kitchen with steam rising and ingredients being prepared
A dancer performing a graceful routine in a studio with flowing movements and dynamic poses

url.description: URL where the video can be downloaded

content_type.description: MIME type of the video file

file_size.description: Size of the video file in bytes

usage_tips: Use clear, action-oriented prompts that describe the desired motion
Higher resolution (768P) provides better quality but may take longer to process
10-second videos are not supported for 1080p resolution
Enable prompt optimizer for better results with complex prompts
Ensure your input image is high quality and relevant to the desired motion
limitations: 10-second videos are not supported for 1080p resolution
Input image must be accessible via URL
Processing time increases with higher resolution and longer durations

pricing.estimated_cost: Higher cost for 768P resolution vs 512P resolution
